Type.Name: DisableDeviceHandler

TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DisableDeviceHandler(object o, DisableDeviceArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed DisableDeviceHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: Gtk# is thread aware, but not thread safe; See the Gtk# Thread Programming for details.

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the DisableDeviceHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the DisableDeviceHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the DisableDeviceHandler is removed from the event.
